text: Jennifer Marie Capriati (born March 29, 1976) is an American retired tennis player. Capriati made her professional debut in 1990 at fourteen years old. In 1992, Capriati defeated Steffi Graf during the Barcelona Olympics to win a Gold medal. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:American tennis players Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Australian Open champions Category:French Open champions Category:Living people Category:Medalists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:World No. 1 tennis players
title: Jennifer Capriati
